uk.ac.soton.simulation.jsit.core

Class DistGeometric

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.ac.soton.simulation.jsit.core.AbstractStochasticItem
      • uk.ac.soton.simulation.jsit.core.Distribution
        • uk.ac.soton.simulation.jsit.core.DistributionDiscrete
          • uk.ac.soton.simulation.jsit.core.DistGeometric
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class DistGeometric
extends DistributionDiscrete
implements java.io.Serializable
    JSIT representation of a (non-shifted) geometric distribution which models the number of failures before a success in independent trials with a success probability p.
    Since:
    0.2
    Author:
    Stuart Rossiter
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
